section.heading: Recordkeeping.
section.text: The Chief Financial Officer shall maintain full and complete records of the conduct and operation of daily numbers games and lotteries and of the regulation of bingo, raffles, and Monte Carlo Night parties, which records shall include a statement of revenues and license fees, prize disbursements, and administrative expenses. The records shall be open and available to the public.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(d)(5) of Sports Wagering Lottery Emergency Amendment Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-630, Jan. 30, 2019, 66 DCR 1745).
